definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: divide (NH makes a partition; As. ḫaṣâṣu, cut in two, Zim:BP 24 n.; Eth. h.as’as’a: curtail, diminish)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. [[חׂחֵץ]] intr. Pr 30:27 of locusts [[כלו]] ´[[ויחא ח]]; i.e. dividing (themselves) into companies or swarms.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. [[מספר חדשׁיו חֻצָָּחוּ]] Job 21:21 the number of his months, they have been cut in two (fig. for curtailed).
